targets.query: SELECT abs(last("value") / 1000) FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'main_energy_meter') AND value < 0 AND time > now() - 5m
SELECT last("value") / 1000 FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'main_energy_meter') AND value > 0 AND time > now() - 5m
SELECT last("value") FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'inverter') AND time > now() - 5m
SELECT last("value") / 1000 FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'house_energy_meter') AND time > now() - 5m
SELECT last("value") FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'hp_energy_meter') AND time > now() - 5m
SELECT non_negative_difference(max("value")) FROM "activeEnergyConsumed" WHERE ("device" = 'house_energy_meter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(linear)
SELECT non_negative_difference(max("value")) FROM "activeEnergyProduced" WHERE ("device" = 'main_energy_meter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum(non_negative_difference("value")) FROM "activeEnergyProducedToday" WHERE ("device" = 'inverter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(max("value")) FROM "activeEnergyProduced" WHERE ("device" = 'main_energy_meter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum(non_negative_difference("value")) FROM "activeEnergyProducedToday" WHERE ("device" = 'inverter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'inverter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") / 1000 FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'house_energy_meter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") / 1000 FROM "activePower" WHERE ("device" = 'house_energy_meter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
